# bayesRates

_bayesRates_ is an R package that allows users to (1) perform two-sample tests with binomial and Poisson data from a Bayesian perspective and (2) determine sample sizes for designing such procedures.

```{r}
library(bayesRates)


```



## Installation

* From Github: `devtools::install_github("dkahle/bayesRates")`

<!-- * From CRAN: `install.packages("bayesRates")` -->
